name: There a no Armadillos in this game
name_original: There a no Armadillos in this game
description:
There a no Armadillos in this game.

An amusing game about animals that just can't stop rolling around.
Try to collect all gems and beat level in four different settings.
Each of them contains various obstacles or enemies.
There a no Armadillos in this game is a puzzle platformer
where you have to time your jumps precise to finish the level.

This game includes:
  • cute animals
  • non stop rolling
  • platform puzzle action
  • you only need one button
  • achievements
  • no microtransactions
  • no horse armor
  • no Armadillos
  • no long lists
